neutral: Drink to become invulnerable for 8 seconds. Cannot attack during this time.
Damage absorbed will slow you when the effect ends.
changes: Apply a slow effect to the player after phasing wears off, based on the amount of damage they absorbed. Speed decreased by -25% at low damage, to -50% at 200+ damage. Lasts 5 seconds.

neutral: Drink to become invulnerable for 8 seconds. Cannot attack during this time.
